DigiCon

We bring accountability and data to the construction industry

Our construction project management software is based on three strategic ‘pillars’ that enable you to take back control of your construction projects. Improve collaboration between teams, identify where problems originate, make better decisions with data you can rely on.

Learn more
House & Volume Builders

Clear overview across multiple projects; manage contractors and suppliers effectively.

Free Demo Know More
Clients and Owners

Insight into real-time progress and status on your projects. Construction insights and overviews across projects.

Free Demo Know More
Contractors

Connect site to office with real-time mobile field reporting. Easily coordinate with sub-contractors and suppliers.

Free Demo Know More
Sub-contractors

Automatically receive updates on tasks and easily document progress to main contractors and clients

Free Demo Know More
Material Suppliers

Construction software that provides real-time planning and progress monitoring, allowing you to schedule deliveries to site optimally.

Free Demo Know More
Finance

Construction software that provides real-time planning and progress monitoring, allowing you to schedule intake of finance coherently with site operation.

Free Demo Know More

A versatile solution to help you manage a multitude of issues

Each construction sector comes with its own set of problems. DigiCon offers a flexible approach, able to quickly identify where the issues are, regardless of project size or sector.
